#summary How to build this project code?

= Introduction =

This project is developed under [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven].
So you need to setup maven first.

All prebuilt jars for download are available here:
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=gwtsecurity-1.1.0.jar gwtsecurity-1.1.0.jar] || Primary Library  ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GssDemo-Simple-1.1.0.war GssDemo-Simple-1.1.0.war] || Simple demonstration using spring security for security only without integration with any spring bean .||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GssDemo-GwtSL-1.1.0.war GssDemo-GwtSL-1.1.0.war] || Secure demonstration  if you're using  [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-sl/ gwt-sl] with spring integration .  ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GssDemo-spring4gwt-1.1.0.war GssDemo-spring4gwt-1.1.0.war] || Secure demonstration  if you're using  [http://code.google.com/p/spring4gwt/ spring4gwt] with spring integration .  ||

= Details =

You can download this code using [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion].  Run the command:
{{{ 
svn co https://gwtsecurity.googlecode.com/svn/tags/gwtsecurity-1.1.0 
}}}

Then, run the command:
{{{ 
cd gwtsecurity-1.1.0
mvn install
}}}
to install library to your local repository. 

You can download the demo application using [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion].  Run the command:
{{{ 
svn co https://gwtsecurity.googlecode.com/svn/tags/gwt4ssdemo-1.1.0
}}}

Then, run the command:
{{{
cd gwt4ssdemo-1.1.0
mvn package
}}}
